 * *Label* = esophagus secretion
 * *Definition* = A secretion that is part of a esophagus [Automatically generated definition].

## Synonyms

 * esophageal secretion
 * gullet secretion
 * oesophagus secretion
 * secretion of esophagus
 * secretion of gullet
 * secretion of oesophagus
